message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe you'll find very valuable. I'm starting with an offer of $25000. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $25000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $15000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $15000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $20000. This still leaves room for both of us to get a good deal. Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, thank you for the revised offer. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $20000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $17500. Can you consider my offer?
